Update Manager API: Util.humanize module¶

Human-readable unit conversion utilities

UpdateManager.Util.humanize.humanize_size(num_bytes)¶
Convert a given size in bytes to a nicer better readable unit
UpdateManager.Util.humanize.humanize_seconds(seconds)¶

Convert a duration given in seconds to a human-readable string.

Parameter:seconds – Seconds as a string
